timesync.name: Time Sync
timesync.description: Performs a Time Synchronisation of an ONVIF Camera

Address.name: Address
Address.description: The address of the camera to synchronise.

Port.name: Port
Port.description: The port number to connect to on the camera.

Username.name: Username
Username.description: The username to use to connect to the camera.

Password.name: Password
Password.description: The password to use to connect to the camera.
